title: Why do people blame the victim?
itunes:author: David B. Feldman - psychology | social science | politics | mental health
itunes:summary: Even with the rise of the #MeToo movement, victim-blaming remains a tenacious problem. Could the tendency to blame the victim be programmed into the human mind at the most basic level? And how can we undo it?
itunes:subtitle: Even with the rise of the #MeToo movement, victimâ€¦
description: Even with the rise of the #MeToo movement, victim-blaming remains a tenacious problem. Could the tendency to blame the victim be programmed into the human mind at the most basic level? And how can we undo it?
